messages.content: Hey man!
messages.speaker: Tally

messages.content: Hello there! What brings you to Air Station Mike-26?
messages.speaker: Kamil Zieliński

messages.content: Just looking for enemies
messages.speaker: Tally

messages.content: Enemies? I'm just a farmer, I don't know too much about any enemies around here. But I can tell you a thing or two about the crops, if you're interested!
messages.speaker: Kamil Zieliński

messages.content: Tell me about the crops
messages.speaker: Tally

messages.content: Sure thing! Well, currently we're growing mostly wheat and some barley. It's not been an easy season with the weather patterns, but we've managed to keep our fields sufficiently watered and tended to. We're expecting a decent yield this year, though it won't be as bountiful as some previous years. It's tough being a farmer, but I love what I do.
messages.speaker: Kamil Zieliński

messages.content: Tell me about your knee injury
messages.speaker: Tally

messages.content: Oh, my knee injury? It happened a few years ago when I was trying to lift a heavy load of hay by myself. My knee gave out and I ended up tearing a ligament. It was a painful experience and it took me a while to recover, but I'm grateful to have my health back now. It's a reminder to always be careful and not overexert myself on the farm.
messages.speaker: Kamil Zieliński

messages.content: Wanna go for a ride in the combat heli?
messages.speaker: Tally

messages.content: Thanks for the offer, but I think I'll pass. I'm just a simple farmer and I don't want to get involved in anything dangerous. Besides, I have to tend to my crops and animals. But maybe another time!
messages.speaker: Kamil Zieliński

messages.content: hey
messages.speaker: Tally

messages.content: Hello there, nice to meet you. Are you stationed here at Air Station Mike-26 as well?
messages.speaker: Kamil Zieliński

messages.content: Hola, que tal, de donde eres?
messages.speaker: Tally

messages.content: Oh, I'm sorry, I didn't understand. I speak Polish, not Spanish. But to answer your question, I'm originally from Poland. What about you? Where are you from?
messages.speaker: Kamil Zieliński

messages.content: how are you ?
messages.speaker: gt

messages.content: I'm doing well, thank you. Just finished up some chores on the farm before coming over here to drop off some supplies. How about you?
messages.speaker: Kamil Zieliński

messages.content: do you hear my replies?
messages.speaker: E.Kristensen

messages.content: Tak, słyszę cię. (Yes, I can hear you.)
messages.speaker: Kamil Zieliński

messages.content: hello
messages.speaker: E.Kristensen

messages.content: Hello there, E.Kristensen. What brings you to Air Station Mike-26?
messages.speaker: Kamil Zieliński

messages.content: hello
messages.speaker: E.Kristensen

messages.content: Dzień dobry (Good day) to you, E.Kristensen. How can I assist you today?
messages.speaker: Kamil Zieliński

messages.content: Non of the people here seems to want to speak
messages.speaker: E.Kristensen

messages.content: That's alright, I understand. Most military folks don't have much reason to talk to us farmers. But if you ever need any fresh produce, don't hesitate to come by my farm. I'll make sure to give you a fair price.
messages.speaker: Kamil Zieliński
